Title: 2Shy
Plot: A man with a genetic abnormality who must prey on overweight women in order to suck the fatty tissue from their bodies, begins to meet his victims through internet chat rooms.
GuestStars: Timothy Carhart, James Hardy, Catherine Paolone, Glynis Davies, Aloka McLean, Kerry Sandomirsky, Suzy Joachim, Randi Lynne, William MacDonald, Brad Wattum, Beverly Elliot, Dean McKenzie, P.J. Prinsloo, Jan Bailey
